sentences.sContent: As you listen, consider the following questions. Then we’ll examine the answers in the debrief.
sentences.sContent_eng: As you listen, consider the following questions. Then we’ll examine the answers in the debrief.
sentences.sCn: 听录音时，考虑以下的问题，我们在听取汇报时会检查答案。

remMethod.val: de + brief(简述) → 听取报告

words.tran: 任务报告；任务报告中提出的情报

trans.tranCn: 听取报告, 听取汇报
